::Spitfire::

She smiled.  Her hood open and her smiled showed part of her fangs.  
She chuckled, "He doesn't like snakes I see.  That is all right.  I 
don't mind at all. So what do you want to do now?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "ilovealllizards" <ilovealllizards@p...> 
wrote:
> *Kamodia walks into the base and calls every Maximal on her 
Commlink*
> Kamodia: Everyone, we have a new Maximal on our side, her name is 
Spitfire
> and she is going to fight by our sides. *Kamodia smiles at Spitfire 
walks to
> the table that Wrath is sitting at* Kamodia: Wrath, this is 
Spitfire.
> Wrath:...... *Wrath stands up and walks into the back of the base* 
Kamodia:
> Sorry about him. He's a real stinker. He's been a grumpy ass lately.
> *Kamodia says to Spitfire and than laughs a bit*
